title: New rune update problems
body: I have been playing league sometime now-- usually when I have my five rune pages set up so that I have a AP and AD just for a generic set up. I started playing Veigar yesterday and I was shocked when I look at my AP page, I had lost my greater mark of ap and had them replaced with a greater mark of magic penetration-- I've had that page for almost seven months now, I'm not crazy I swear, but it's a little odd that this has occured.

replies.body: Did a quick check on your account and I don't see that you ever purchased greater marks of ability power.  I see Greater Seals, Glyphs, and Quints of AP, but no marks.  Also based on another comment I don't see any strange logins from your account.   Sorry to say, but I think this may just be a case of mistaken memory :(

Hey Hitical Crit,

It sounds like someone else may have changed that rune page. If you haven't already you should update your passwords and run a virus and malware scan. I don't recall ever seeing a thread where a rune on someone's rune page magically changed due to something Riot did.
